index1.js(15,1): error TS1203: Export assignment cannot be used when targeting ECMAScript modules. Consider using 'export default' or another module format instead.


==== index1.js (1 errors) ====
    /**
     * const doc comment
     */
    const x = (a) => {
        return '';
    };
    
    /**
     * function doc comment
     */
    function b() {
        return 0;
    }
    
    module.exports = {x, b}
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS1203: Export assignment cannot be used when targeting ECMAScript modules. Consider using 'export default' or another module format instead.
